body_html: I think some numbers about why tf.contrib.distributions is not fast enough would be needed before accepting this (in general we only try to add custom ops when we can't get the equivalent from compositions of primitive ops at a reasonable speed).
body_text: I think some numbers about why tf.contrib.distributions is not fast enough would be needed before accepting this (in general we only try to add custom ops when we can't get the equivalent from compositions of primitive ops at a reasonable speed).
body: I think some numbers about why tf.contrib.distributions is not fast enough would be needed before accepting this (in general we only try to add custom ops when we can't get the equivalent from compositions of primitive ops at a reasonable speed).
